photoRequired.question: Why are photos required for expense records?
photoRequired.answer: Proof is required for all expenses for transparent financial management. This helps family members trust each other and keeps accurate records for later review. Please attach receipts or product photos.

leaveFamily.question: Can I leave a family room?
leaveFamily.answer: Yes, you can use the leave function in family room settings. However, room owners must transfer ownership to another member before leaving. Even after leaving, your existing ledger records will be preserved.

dataBackup.question: I'm worried about data loss
dataBackup.answer: All data is securely stored in the cloud with automatic backups. Even when you delete your account, ledger data is preserved so other family members can continue to access it. Only personal information is deleted while ledger records remain intact.

categories.question: Can I add or modify categories?
categories.answer: Currently, only default categories are available (Food, Transportation, Shopping, Medical, etc.). Custom category functionality will be added in future updates.

tooManyNotifications.question: I'm getting too many notifications
tooManyNotifications.answer: You can turn off unwanted notifications in Profile ‚Üí Notification Settings. You can individually configure ledger record notifications, family invite notifications, and member join notifications.
